input.sentences: so today i ran across this frozen lake on a dare and the ice gave way . i fell in .
when i fell in i teleported to this gate .
when i walked through the gate i found this little field with footprints in it .
when i followed the prints i found blood in the snow .
i walked even further and i did n't find anything at all .
output.sentences: The snow and ice covered the lake.
The snow gives our gate a look right out of a magazine!
The trees covered in snow looks like a Bob Ross painting, it's beautiful.
The snow highlights how brutal nature is for the animal kingdom.
Our road couldn't be seen due to all of the beautiful snow!
